1.content: First off who kicks off the transformations ?
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Aladdin and Jasmine the Lamian couples
Aladdin a different species of real or myth.
11.content:
You have chosen Aladdin.

What changes will come to him?

1. He and Jasmine stay Lamias
2. Aladdin wishes to be Immortal by becoming a genie
3. Aladdin gets hypnotized by Saleen and with her, he becomes a merman.
4. Aladdin becomes an animal of mythical or real.
5 Something else.
11.title: Aladdin

12.content: Princess Jasmine walked out on one of the balconies of the palace as the sun was going down over the city. She loved to watch the sun go down over Agrabah. The beautiful sunset always put her at peace. Except not tonight. It had been a exactly 2 years since they had defeated Jafar by destroying the lamp and since that time Agrabah had been attacked several more times by other super natural entities. What Agrabah needed was a protector who could crush any threat to the city.
12.title: Princess Jasmine

15.content: here are some more choices
15.title: Readers Choice

152.content:
You have selected Eden: The green genie of the bottle.

What changes do you have in mind for her?

1. Go back in time to 2,000 years ago when Eden was a human and something caused her to be the genie she is today.
2. Eden wishes to become a free genie.
3. She switches bodies with someone.
4. Eden becomes a human again.
5. Something else.
152.title: eden

info.brief_description: Change the characters of Aladdin. Anything goes.
info.description:
The people of Agrabah start changing. The story can go anywhere.

Will not allow:
M/M
Scat

Other than that have fun
